Du Hoang
UX · UI · VR · AR Designer
I'm excited about the future of VR/AR design. The technology has matured, and we, as designers, are now capable of creating seamless digital worlds from our dreams.

About.com
Other Works
Patrón Social Club

I was part of the team that created a social network for Patrón Tequila. I designed and built the front-end of various sections and interactive widgets on the site.

American Express

I worked as UX designer and lead front-end developer on various digital campaigns and microsites for American Express.

Hashable

I was a design consultant for Hashable, where I designed and prototyped new features for their web app.

Spoton Trivia

I designed a location based mobile trivia game with a team on the Startupbus Hackathon enroute to SxSW.

Screening Room

I won second place at HackTV Hackathon for Screening Room, a social video web app.

Little Pilots

Little Pilots is a 3D animated short film that I made for my thesis at SVA, where I studied design and computer animation.
